name: The Game With No Graphics Remix (Analytics Test)
name_original: The Game With No Graphics Remix (Analytics Test)
description:
This game was originally made by dataecho (user on itch). I worked on this remix with the creator and another classmate for a class and now the game is being used to gather some data! Thank you for taking time out to play the game! 

To move, use WASD or the arrow keys. You will also need to use your mouse to explore the area!

If you need to pause the game, hit the 'esc' key!
